metadata.title: Ebros Elemental Sandstorm Cloud Wind Adult Mother Dragon and Baby Wyrmling Collectible Statue Set Mythical Fantasy Age of Dragons Behemoth Figurine Artwork by Anne Stokes
features: This Wind Cloud Baby Dragon Wyrmling Statue is approximately 4.5" tall and 4" long and 3" deep. It weighs about 5 ounces.
This Wind Cloud Full Grown Adult Dragon Statue is approximately 12.25" tall and 8.25" long and 4.25" deep. It weighs about 1.75 pounds.

These are gorgeous and stunning pieces of fantasy art. Our sculptors and painters have done an excellent job in creating great details and characters to the dragons. Each sculpture is made of polyresin, hand painted and polished individually.
Soda can and props placed next to the statue are not included with the listing. They are meant to provide size perspective of the item.
